name: State Mediation Grants
objective: To assist States in establishing and administering mediation programs and services for agricultural producers, creditors of producers, (as applicable) and persons involved in an issue for which mediation services are provided by a Certified Mediation Program.

results.description: In Fiscal Year 2024, the States of Delaware and Ohio were certified to participate in the State Mediation Program.  Bringing the total to 44 certified programs.

rules_regulations: 7 CFR Part 785, published on September 10, 2002; revised on April 14, 2022.
